text: Enniskillen (, from , 'Ceithlenn's island') is a town and civil parish in County Fermanagh, Northern Ireland. It had a population of 13,823 at the 2011 Census. It was the seat of local government for the former Fermanagh District Council, and is the county town of Fermanagh as well as its largest town. The conditions of life for many of its people was once exceptionally poor.BBC short which illustrates the former poverty. In 1987, a Provisional Irish Republican Army bombing killed 12 people. ==References== Category:County towns in Northern Ireland
title: Enniskillen
